name: Artifact Control
description:
Capture the artifact! The artifact causes a random effect to happen every 10 seconds.

Use mana to summon units to go take control of the artifact.

Artifact effects: Increase enemy/player attack or speed, give player/enemy mana, randomize all unit positions

Controls:

Typical RTS controls, if you're familiar

- WASD to pan camera

- Shift to pan faster

- Left click to select unit, drag to select multiple

- Select the summoning circle in your base to access your spells

- Right click to give commands to units

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51 by Cole Dunham and Apo Koftikian

Art: https://www.kenney.nl/assets
